org.aslab.om.metacontrol
Class ComponentsECL

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.aslab.om.ecl.ECL
          org.aslab.om.metacontrol.ComponentsECL
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actuator, Sensor, java.lang.Runnable
public class ComponentsECL
extends ECL
implements Sensor, Actuator

Implementation of a control loop for components

The ComponentsECL follows the operation schema in the ECL

@see org.aslab.om.ecl.ECL ECL

detailed description of perception, evaluation and control

Author:
chcorbato

Field Detail

goalState

private ComponentsGoalTracker goalState

kdb

private OMcomponentsKB kdb

plan

private PlanManager plan

contains the current plan for reconfiguration of the components structure of the plant.

It is an ordered set (list)

this attribute should go in an hypothetical action or control object if that part is isolated from the rest of the ECL

actionExecution

private void actionExecution(java.util.ArrayList<ComponentAction> actions)

method that implements the executor element of the control/action part of the ECL (like RCS job assigner+executors)

takes a plan as input and commands the actuators accordingly
